tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE course_materials (
  course_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  lecture_title VARCHAR(255),
  lecture_content TEXT,
  lecture_date DATE,
  slide_title VARCHAR(255),
  slide_content TEXT,
  slide_date DATE,
  assignment_title VARCHAR(255),
  assignment_description TEXT,
  assignment_deadline DATE
)

CREATE TABLE assignments (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    title VARCHAR,
    description TEXT,
    due_date DATE,
    course_id INT
);
